author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: Vue.js is an effective tool for creating web components, especially with Vue CLI 3 and the new @vue/web-component-wrapper. In this article, we'll look at reasons why you might want to create web components and how you can make your first one with nothing more than a basic knowledge of Vue.
name: Create & Publish Web Components With Vue CLI 3
